definitions.definition: Of, relating to, or made of rheum ( “ thin or watery discharge of mucus or serum ” ) ; watery.
Producing rheum from the mucous membranes ; ( also figuratively ) especially of the eyes : filled with rheum; watery.
Especially of the air : damp , moist .

main_definition: Of, relating to, or made of rheum ( “ thin or watery discharge of mucus or serum ” ) ; watery.
secondary_definitions: Producing rheum from the mucous membranes ; ( also figuratively ) especially of the eyes : filled with rheum; watery.
( literary , poetic , obsolete ) Especially of the air : damp , moist .
